entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is trying to sneak past workers.

entities.name: workers
entities.description: A group of people working on something, so intent that they won't notice Harry.

entities.name: witch
entities.description: A young person who is also a witch, next to whom Harry places the pamphlet.

entities.name: pamphlet
entities.description: A completed document that Harry takes from the pile and examines under his Invisibility Cloak.

relationships.description: Harry is trying to sneak past the workers, who are so intent on their work that they won't notice him.
Harry places the pamphlet next to a young witch.
Harry takes the completed pamphlet from the pile and examines it under his Invisibility Cloak.
The workers are so intent on their work that they won't notice Harry.
